content: Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. I understand you need plumbing assistance. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Charles. Could you provide me with the address where you need the plumbing service?
Thank you for the address, Charles. I’ll just check if your location is within our service area.
Good news, Charles! Your address is within our service area. When would be an ideal time for us to come out for your plumbing service?
I’d prefer any morning next week, if possible.
Thanks for letting me know. I'll check our schedule for available morning slots next week.
Charles, we have availability next week on Tuesday and Thursday mornings between 8:00 AM and 10:00 AM. Do either of those times work for you?
Unfortunately, I have appointments those mornings, so neither Tuesday nor Thursday works for me.
I understand, Charles. Are there any other days or times that might be better for you?
Honestly, my schedule is pretty tight, and mornings are best. I don't think any available slots fit my timing, so I think I will have to pass for now.
reason: Customer unable to find a convenient appointment time
